Business, Marketing & Information Techno.1: Make content knowledge accessible to students.
Business, Marketing & Information Techno.2: Create, implement and assess instructional and curricular goals.
Business, Marketing & Information Techno.3: Create and maintain a respectful and productive classroom learning environment.

Business, Marketing & Information Techno.7: Apply key concepts of career ready practice.
